# SKStoreProductViewControllerDelegate

**Protocol**

A protocol to call when the customer dismisses the store screen.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol SKStoreProductViewControllerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Typically, this protocol is implemented by the view controller in your application that originally displayed the store screen.

## Responding to a Dismiss Action

- **productViewControllerDidFinish(_:)**: Called when the user dismisses the store screen.

## Setting a delegate

- **delegate**: The store view controller’s delegate.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Called when the user dismisses the store screen.
items.name: productViewControllerDidFinish(_:)
